DOC.brief_title: Fluorine F 18 Fluorodopa-Labeled PET Scan Planning Surgery Radiation Therapy Treating Patients With Newly Diagnosed High- Low-Grade Malignant Glioma
DOC.detailed_description: PRIMARY OBJECTIVES : I . To determine correlation 18F-FDOPA PET activity , MRI contrast enhancement , high- low-grade glioma biopsy . II . To compare radiotherapy target volume delineation without 18F- FDOPA-PET metabolic image information determine role metabolic image radiotherapy treatment planning . SECONDARY OBJECTIVES : I . To determine correlation concordance 18F-FDOPA PET activity , MRI contrast enhancement , high- low-grade glioma biopsy patient outcomes include overall survival progression free survival . OUTLINE : Beginning 1 week biopsy resection , patient undergo fluorine F 18 fluorodopa-labeled PET/CT scan pre-operative MRI . Patients undergo stereotactic craniotomy . Some patient may also undergo radiation therapy . After completion study treatment , patient follow every year 5 year .
